page.title: 17A DAY IN SCHOOL
page.content: When the bell goes in the morning we line up and go into the hall for assembly.The Head teacher talks to us, we say our prayers and then sing a hymn.After that we go back to class and our teacher calls the register. There is a list of things written on the blackboard which we have to do throughout the day.We work until half past ten and then we go out to play for fifteen minutes.The girls often play bulldogs and the boys usually play football.We go back to class and work until midday.Then we have dinner and go out to play until quarter past one.We do our work until half past three usually art and individual topic.If we have not finished our maths and English we do that instead.Then we go home.
